sentences.sContent: Fish and shellfish are the specialties.
sentences.sCn: 鱼和甲壳类水生动物是特产。

remMethod.val: shell(壳) + fish(鱼) → 甲壳类动物

trans.tranCn: 甲壳类动物；贝类等有壳的水生动物
trans.tranOther: an animal that lives in water, has a shell, and can be eaten as food, for example  crab s  ,  lobster s  , and  oyster s
